Article 2 col - image left text right.body:
article.article$1
  .container
    / Note: Only one h1 element per <article> element is valid
    h1 $2
    .row.image-left-text-right
      .col-md-6
        = image_tag($3, alt: 'example image', class: 'img-fluid')
      .col-md-6
        p $0
Article 2 col - image left text right.description: Article element with two columns and image to the left and text to the right

Article with slider.body:
article.article$1
    .container.text-center
      h1 $2
      .slicker-slider*{ data: { slick: '{}' } }
        div
          $3
        div
          $0
Article with slider.description: Article element with slider on the inside
